name: responsive-demo
description: Complete responsive design demo with HTML, SCSS, and TypeScript

scripts.build:js: tsc frontend/js/app.ts --outDir frontend/js --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --lib ES2020,DOM --skipLibCheck
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch:js: tsc --watch frontend/js/app.ts --outDir frontend/js --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --lib ES2020,DOM --skipLibCheck
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
